summary: This document is the trust agreement for the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2019 Trust, outlining the terms of the trust, the roles of the grantor and trustees, and the distribution of assets upon the grantor's death. It details specific bequests to various individuals and conditions for distributions, as well as provisions for the management and administration of the trust.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: He is the creator of the trust and outlines the terms and conditions for its administration and distribution.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: He is one of the trustees responsible for managing the trust according to the terms set by the grantor.

persons.name: Richard D. Kahn
persons.context: He is another trustee tasked with the administration of the trust alongside Darren K. Indyke.

persons.name: Karyna Shuliak
persons.context: She is named as a beneficiary in the trust, set to receive significant financial distributions upon the grantor's death.

persons.name: Michelle Fern Saipher
persons.context: She is mentioned as a beneficiary who may receive distributions from the trust.

persons.name: Lesley Katherine Groff
persons.context: She is listed as a beneficiary in the trust agreement.

persons.name: Lawrence Paul Visoski, Jr.
persons.context: He is mentioned as a beneficiary entitled to receive distributions from the trust.

persons.name: Luciano A. Fontanilla, Jr.
persons.context: He is named as a beneficiary in the trust agreement.

persons.name: Lisa Kahn
persons.context: She is mentioned as a beneficiary who may receive distributions from the trust.

persons.name: Paul Barrett
persons.context: He is listed as a beneficiary in the trust agreement.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein appointed Darren K. Indyke as a trustee of his trust.
Jeffrey E. Epstein appointed Richard D. Kahn as a trustee of his trust.
Darren K. Indyke and Richard D. Kahn serve together as trustees of the Jeffrey E. Epstein Trust.
Karyna Shuliak is a beneficiary of the trust established by Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Michelle Fern Saipher is identified as the spouse of Darren K. Indyke.

events.title: Establishment of the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2019 Trust
events.description: The trust agreement was executed, establishing the terms for the management and distribution of the trust assets.

locations: Zorro Ranch, 49 Zorro Ranch Road, Stanley, New Mexico
Little St. James, U.S. Virgin Islands
Great St. James, U.S. Virgin Islands
358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, Florida
9 E. 71st Street, New York, New York
keyFacts: The trust was established to manage and distribute Jeffrey E. Epstein's assets after his death.
Darren K. Indyke and Richard D. Kahn are appointed as trustees of the trust.
Karyna Shuliak is set to receive significant financial distributions from the trust.
The trust includes provisions for the payment of debts, taxes, and specific bequests to various individuals.
The trust agreement allows for amendments to be made by the grantor during his lifetime.
